results.name: a(n) = number of prime divisors of Carmichael numbers A002997(n).
comment: Number of prime divisors is always >= 3. For the least Carmichael number with n prime factors see A006931.
link: Amiram Eldar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
results.author: _Artur Jasinski_, Nov 25 2007
